value.desc: Use v-model to control active state

opacity.desc: Used to change the opacity of the overlay

z-index.desc: Used to change the z-index of the overlay

cursor-type.desc: Used to change the cursor type of the overlay. Any valid cursor type is allowed except for `url`

default.desc: Anything can go into this slot

body.desc: Anything using the body slot will be placed above the overlay
